definition: hands and feet/(fig.) brothers/retinue, henchmen, accomplices
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
at a loss to know what to do (idiom); bewildered
as close as one's hands and feet (idiom); loving one another as brothers/deep friendship/closely attached to one another
as close as brothers (idiom); deep friendship
hand foot and mouth disease, HFMD, caused by a number of intestinal viruses, usually affecting young children
human hand foot and mouth disease, a viral infection
to regard sb as a brother (idiom)

sentences.english: Yet they were three fine, well-set fellows enough.
sentences.chinese: 但是，兄弟三个关系不错，手足之情牢不可破。

sentences.english: Both hands and feet are bent.
The virus EV71 is a common cause of HFMD.
sentences.chinese: 现时肠病毒71型是引起手足口病的主要致病原。

sentences.english: He was as pale as death and trembling in every limb.
sentences.chinese: 他面色惨白，手足都在哆嗦。

sentences.english: Raise Chu lanky iciness, the whole body of spirit shivers.
sentences.chinese: 翘楚手足冰冷，气的浑身颤抖。

sentences.english: The speed of change is rapid, the statistics bewildering.
sentences.chinese: 变化速度之快，令统计工作手足无措。

sentences.english: HFMD is often confused with foot-and-mouth disease of cattle sheep and swine.
sentences.chinese: 手足口病经常容易与牛羊猪的口蹄疫混淆。

sentences.english: Those two comrades are hand -in-glove with each other.
Methods Absorbable stick were adopted in the treating 37 cases of hand and foot bone fracture.
sentences.chinese: 方法应用可吸收棒治疗37例手足部管状骨骨折。

sentences.english: To observe the cure effect of Tanreqing Injection on children hand-foot-mouth disease.
sentences.chinese: 观察痰热清注射液治疗儿童手足口病的疗效。

sentences.english: The majority of HFMD did not have demonstrable epidemiology history.
sentences.chinese: 大多数手足口病病例没有明确的流行学接触史。

sentences.english: We see it as a tragedy of brother against brother.
sentences.chinese: 我们把这看作手足兄弟之间的一个悲剧。

sentences.english: Don't you see that he has losen his head?
sentences.chinese: 难道，你没看到他手足无措的样子？

sentences.english: In my fumbled excitement, I misdialed my brother's phone number three times.
sentences.chinese: 由于激动得手足无措，我三次错拨了弟弟的电话号码。

sentences.english: Now is no specific treatment for hand, foot and mouth disease.
sentences.chinese: 目前还没有对手足口病有具体的冶疗。

sentences.english: This significantly increases their chances of resisting FMD.
sentences.chinese: 这显著增加了它们抵抗手足口病的机会。

definition: the four limbs of the body
hand and foot/movement of limbs/action/trick/step in a procedure (CL: 道[dao4])
as close as brothers (idiom); deep friendship
